Judul: Reagent or catalyst? ��� FeS as activator for persulfate in water
Abstrak:
FeS was evaluated as heterogeneous activator for peroxydisulfate (PS) with trichloroethene (TCE) chosen as
model substance representing organic water pollutants prone to fast oxidation by sulfate radicals. The TCE
degradation followed in most cases pseudo-first-order kinetics with a FeS-normalized maximum rate constant of.....
Kata Kunci: Persulfate activation, Sulfate radicals, Iron sulfide, TCE oxidation
